translations: <正式>唤醒，（使）醒来；激励，（使）振奋；激起（某种情感）；激怒，使激动；使（某事物）发生，引起；搅动（液体，尤指酿制中的啤酒）

sentences.sentence: He did more to rouse the crowd there than anybody else.
sentences.translation: 他比其他任何人都更卖力地鼓动那里的群众。

sentences.sentence: She seemed to be unable to rouse herself to do anything.
sentences.translation: 她似乎打不起精神做任何事情。

sentences.sentence: Richard couldn't rouse himself to say anything in reply.
